body: If, on starting Magarena, the missing images notification is displayed and you then download all missing playable card images the notification is not removed until after a restart. Need to refresh MainMenuScreen after download otherwise people might think they have to download unimplemented images as well (which they don't).
author: [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/)
title: Missing cards notification message not updated after download.
content:
_From [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/) on August 05, 2014 20:42:13_

If, on starting Magarena, the missing images notification is displayed and you then download all missing playable card images the notification is not removed until after a restart. Need to refresh MainMenuScreen after download otherwise people might think they have to download unimplemented images as well (which they don't).

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=638_
